short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays a new vine quote along with the user's top sites every time new tab is opened

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Upon opening a new tab, enjoy a fresh vine quote, along with links to your top sites.

Simple and soothing.

RIP Vine.
